subject: Question for box users
author: Rebecca
full_text:
Hello All -

I have been studying this format of communication for better part of a 
year now.  I have been listening to clips and reading posts here for 
sometime and am impressed with direction of your work.  The majority of 
clips I've listened to, regardless of the type of box used, are quite 
clear.  My question to you is as follows:  are the files edited or 
changed at all or is this the quality they are coming through at?  

- Rak
